channel.title: Dragon claws server side
channel.description: Please help, i added the dragon claws anims and emote to my client. But i stil l dont have. Do i have to add someting server sided? If so how..

item.title: Dragon claws server side
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

You need to go to your client java and add the animation to the server and to the dragon claws id.

such as:

In the client.java add the animation to these parts.

public int GetWepAnim(int id)

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

Then you must add the correct gfx to the special of the dragon claws.

I hope i have helped.

Gl.

Read full topic
